name: Rooms 2
description:
A text-based exploration game, based around a grid of about 90,000 rooms. Requires python to work. Fight monsters, find treasure, and try to get as far as possible without dying!

The game is in Python and requires a program that can execute Python code.

(I should warn you that if you manage to get 300 rooms away from the starting point, the game may stop working because of trying to load rooms that aren't there. You probably won't get that far though, so don't worry.)
